radiographic_examinations.findings: Evidence of non-strangulated inguinal hernia, sludge/stones in gallbladder.
The liver is normal in size and appearance. No biliary dilatation. Gallbladder contains stones and sludge; wall is edematous. No hydronephrosis or ascites.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Multiple gallstones identified in prior abdomen CT.
